title: Words and labels
creator_credit: Lawrie Lawler and Centre for Educational Television
brief_description: Explains the methods and techniques for showing printing and writing on a television screen, including the presenter’s over handwriting. Stresses the need for good timing and rehearsals. Some suggestions are made on dealing with awkward or unusually shaped objects. Companion film to “Graphics and Superimposition”.
creator_credit_for_label: Lawrie Lawler and Centre for Educational Television
